text: Simple Coding
translation: 简单编码

text: Python programming involves fewer lines of codes as compared to other languages available for programming. It is able to execute programs in the least lines of code. Moreover, Python automatically offers assistance to identify and associate data types.

text: Python programming follows an indentation based nesting structure. The language can process lengthy tasks within a short span of time. As there is no limitation to data processing, you can compute data in commodity machines, laptop, cloud, and desktop.
